entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
